name: Jumptothetop
description:
The objective is to get to the top. Avoid Arrows and red zones. Watch out! Moving platforms can betray you!

Sorry for not having coyote time. I know it's a little frustrating, but hopefully you can have fun trying to speed run this <3  

There is a lot that can be improved, this is honestly my first time trying to make a game in 3D (but that's no excuse lol).
